title: Enperry Splat Dualies
paragraphs: The Enperry Splat Dualies are a main weapon in Splatoon 2 & Splatoon 3. They are a variant of the Splat Dualies with the same stats but a different loadout and look, inspired by the gear brand Enperry.
The Enperry Splat Dualies share their builds with the Splat Dualies. However, the Enperry Splat Dualies are black and gold with the Enperry logo on the sides and highlights both in white.
The Enperry Splat Dualies come in a set with Curling Bombs and the Inkjet.
- Pearl wielding the Enperry Splat Dualies in promotional art for Action vs. Comedy.
The Enperry Splat Dualies return in Splatoon 3 in Chill Season 2023. They keep their Curling Bombs, and now have the Triple Splashdown.
Reaching certain Freshness levels with the Enperry Splat Dualies will reward the player with special badges that they can use on their Splashtag.
- The Tableturf Battle card icon of the Enperry Splat Dualies

For competitive tips about the Enperry Splat Dualies
- In Splatoon 2, the Enperry Splat Dualies share the same sub and special weapon as the Splat Dualies that appeared during the Splatoon 2 Global Testfire.
- When doing the Triple Splashdown trial in Judd's trials, the player is given the Enperry Splat Dualies.
